com.ephesoft.dcma.da.dao

Interface BatchInstanceDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<BatchInstance>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchInstanceDaoImpl

    public interface BatchInstanceDao
extends Dao<BatchInstance>
    This class is responsible to fetch data of batch instance table from data base.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft

      • getBatchInstances

        java.util.List<BatchInstance> getBatchInstances(java.lang.String batchIdentifierTextSearch,
                                              java.lang.String batchNameTextSearch,
                                              java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> statusList,
                                              int firstResult,
                                              int maxResults,
                                              java.util.List<Order> orderList,
                                              java.util.List<BatchInstanceFilter> filterClauseList,
                                              java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
                                              java.lang.String userName,
                                              java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
                                              EphesoftUser ephesoftUser,
                                              java.lang.String searchString)
        An api to fetch all the batch instances by status list. Parameter firstResult set a limit upon the number of objects to be retrieved. Parameter maxResults set the first result to be retrieved. Parameter orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        Parameters:
        batchIdentifierTextSearch - String
        batchNameTextSearch - String
        statusList - List<BatchInstanceStatus> status list of batch instance status.
        firstResult - Integerthe first result to retrieve, numbered from 0
        maxResults - Integer the maximum number of results
        orderList - List<Order> orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        filterClauseList - List<BatchInstanceFilter> this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the property name and value. If filterClauseList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        batchPriorities - List<BatchPriority> this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the priority list selected. If batchPriorities parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        userName - String
        userRoles - Set<String>
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser
        searchString - String the searchString on which batch instances have to be fetched
        Returns:
        List<BatchInstance>

      • getBatchInstances

        java.util.List<BatchInstance> getBatchInstances(java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> statusList,
                                              int firstResult,
                                              int maxResults,
                                              java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
                                              EphesoftUser ephesoftUser)

        firstResult - Integer
        maxResults - Integer
        userRoles - Set<String>
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser

      • getCount

        int getCount(java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> batchInstStatusList,
           java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
           java.lang.String currentUserName,
           EphesoftUser ephesoftUser)
        An api to fetch count of the batch instance table for batch instance status list, batch priority list on the basis of the user roles. API will return the count for the batch instance having access by the user roles and current user name on the basis of the ephesoft user.
        Parameters:
        batchInstStatusList - List<BatchInstanceStatus>
        batchPriorities - List<BatchPriority>
        userRoles - Set<String>
        currentUserName - String current logged in user name.
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser Enum for ephesoft user.
        Returns:
        Integer ,count of the batch instance present for the batch instance status list and batch priority list.

      • getCount

        int getCount(java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> batchInstStatusList,
           java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
           boolean isCurrUsrNotReq,
           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
           java.lang.String currentUserName,
           EphesoftUser ephesoftUser,
           java.lang.String searchString)
        An api to fetch count of the batch instances for a given status list and batch priority and isCurrUsrNotReq is used for adding the batch instance access by the current user. This API will return the batch instance having access by the user roles on the basis of ephesoft user.
        Parameters:
        batchInstStatusList - List<BatchInstanceStatus>
        batchPriorities - List<BatchPriority> the priority list of the batches * @param isCurrUsrNotReq boolean : true if the current user can be anyone. False if current user cannot be null.
        userRoles - Set<String>
        currentUserName - String
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser
        searchString - String the searchString on which batch instances have to be fetched
        Returns:
        Integer, the count satisfying the above requirements

      • getBatchInstancesExcludedRemoteBatch

        java.util.List<BatchInstance> getBatchInstancesExcludedRemoteBatch(java.lang.String batchNameToBeSearched,
                                                                 java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> statusList,
                                                                 int firstResult,
                                                                 int maxResults,
                                                                 java.util.List<Order> orderList,
                                                                 java.util.List<BatchInstanceFilter> filterClauseList,
                                                                 java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
                                                                 java.lang.String userName,
                                                                 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
                                                                 EphesoftUser ephesoftUser)
        An api to fetch all the batch instances excluding remotely executing batches by status list. Parameter firstResult set a limit upon the number of objects to be retrieved. Parameter maxResults set the first result to be retrieved. Parameter orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided. This will return only those batch instance which having access by the user roles on the basis of the ephesoft user.
        Parameters:
        batchNameToBeSearched - String
        statusList - List<BatchInstanceStatus> status list of batch instance status.
        firstResult - the first result to retrieve, numbered from 0
        maxResults - maxResults the maximum number of results
        orderList - List<Order> orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        filterClauseList - List<BatchInstanceFilter> this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the property name and value. If filterClauseList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        batchPriorities - List<BatchPriority> this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the priority list selected. If batchPriorities parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        userName - String
        userRoles - Set<String>
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser
        Returns:
        List<BatchInstance> return the batch instance list.

      • getRemoteBatchInstances

        java.util.List<BatchInstance> getRemoteBatchInstances(java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> statusList,
                                                    int firstResult,
                                                    int maxResults,
                                                    java.util.List<Order> orderList,
                                                    java.util.List<BatchInstanceFilter> filterClauseList,
                                                    java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
                                                    java.lang.String userName,
                                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles)
        An api to fetch all the batch instances only remotely executing batches by status list. Parameter firstResult set a limit upon the number of objects to be retrieved. Parameter maxResults set the first result to be retrieved. Parameter orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        Parameters:
        statusList - List<BatchInstanceStatus> status list of batch instance status.
        firstResult - the first result to retrieve, numbered from 0
        maxResults - maxResults the maximum number of results
        orderList - List<Order> orderList set the sort property and order of that property. If orderList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        filterClauseList - List<BatchInstanceFilter> this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the property name and value. If filterClauseList parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        batchPriorities - List<BatchPriority> this will add the where clause to the criteria query based on the priority list selected. If batchPriorities parameter is null or empty then this parameter is avoided.
        userName - String Current User.
        userRoles - Set<String> Current User Role.
        Returns:
        List<BatchInstance> return the batch instance list.

                                       java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifier,
                                       java.lang.String currentUserName,
                                       EphesoftUser ephesoftUser)
        This API fetches batch instances which having access by the user roles on the basis of ephesoft user.
        Parameters:
        userRoles - Set<String>
        batchInstanceIdentifier - String
        currentUserName - String
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser
        Returns:
        BatchInstance

      • getBatchInstancesForStatusPriority

        java.util.List<BatchInstance> getBatchInstancesForStatusPriority(java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> statusList,
                                                               java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
                                                               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles)
        This API performs a fetch over all the batch instances on the basis of status, priority and for the given user role.
        Parameters:
        statusList - List<BatchInstanceStatus> batch status list
        batchPriorities - List<BatchPriority> batch priorities list
        userRoles - batch class id's for the role for which the current user is logged in
        Returns:
        List<BatchInstance>

                                                              BatchClass batchClass)
        This API performs a fetch all the batch instance on the basis of the staus and batchclass.

        List<BatchInstance>

      • getBatchInstanceList

        java.util.List<BatchInstance> getBatchInstanceList(java.util.List<BatchInstanceStatus> batchInstStatusList,
                                                 java.util.List<BatchPriority> batchPriorities,
                                                 boolean isNotCurrentUserCheckReq,
                                                 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> userRoles,
                                                 java.lang.String currentUserName,
                                                 EphesoftUser ephesoftUser,
                                                 java.lang.String searchString)
        Gets the batch instance list filtered as per the arguments supplied.
        Parameters:
        batchInstStatusList - List<BatchInstanceStatus>
        batchPriorities - List<BatchPriority> the priority list of the batches
        isNotCurrentUserCheckReq - boolean :true if the current user can be anyone. False if current user cannot be null.
        userRoles - Set<String>
        currentUserName - String
        ephesoftUser - EphesoftUser
        searchString - String the searchString on which batch instances have to be fetched
        Returns:
        List<BatchInstance> returns the batch instance list filtered as per the information passed as arguments

        Returns:
        List<BatchInstance>
